mention.text: Peter Capaldi favourite to take over from Matt Smith as Doctor Who Wednesday 31 Jul 2013 11 : 20 am Peter Capaldi
Capaldi , who plays sweary spin doctor Malcom Tucker in The Thick of It , replacing Matt Smith
Doctor Who creator Steven Moffat said he would not rule out casting an older Doctor
